title: Sollamal Thottu Chellum Thendral Lyrics Dheena
stanzas:
sollaamal thottu chellum thendral
en kaadhal dhevadhaiyin kangal
nenjathil kotti chellum minnal
kannoram minnum aval kaadhal

oru naalaikkulle mella mella
un mounam ennai kolla kolla
indha kaadhalinaal
kaatril parakkum kaagitham aanen

sollaamal thottu chellum thendral
en kaadhal dhevadhaiyin kangal
nenjathil kotti chellum minnal
kannoram minnum aval kaadhal

neruppai vizhungi vitten
oh amilam arundhi vitten
noyaai nenjil nee nuzhaindhaai
marundhai yenadi thara maranthaai
vaalibathin solaiyile ragasiyamaai
poo parithaval nee thaane

sollaamal thottu chellum thendral
en kaadhal dhevadhaiyin kangal
nenjathil kotti chellum minnal
kannoram minnum aval kaadhal

ye pengalin ullam
padu kuzhi enben
vizhundhu ezhunthavan yaar
aazham alandhavan yaar
karaiyai kadandhavan yaar

kaadhal irukkum bayathinil thaan
kadavul bhoomikku varuvathillai
meeri avan
bhoomi vandhaal
dhaadiyudan thaan
alaivaan veedhiyile
